text.en: In this challenge you will learn how to make programming quicker and easier with the help of the loops.
For this challenge put your robot in the center of your challenge field to check the degree of the turns.
Let's start your program flow with moving backward for 2 seconds with medium speed.

In the previous challenge we used the turn block as many times as it took to turn 360-degrees. Now let's use a loop to make a full cirlce: turning 90-degrees 4 times will make a 360-degree-turn to the left. Add a 1-second-break as well to be able to check the degrees on your challenge field, too.
Let's do the same spin to the right, but change the degrees - choose 45-degrees this time with 8 repetitions to make a full circle. Add a 1-second-break.
Now let's add an infinate loop. Add the turn block to it with a 45-degree-turn and a 1-minute-break. With this block you will have an ongoing motion.
Now you can see how much faster programming can be with the help of the loops. Check your program flow and create new programs on your own, too.
